Description of incident: Kathermine Kitss & Co. LLP notified customers of a data breach when hard drives containing backup files for one of the firm's servers was stolen from one of the partner's cars.There was personal information contained on that drive that included names, addresses, dates of birth, Social Security number, and other information contained in your tax return. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-60867
